author: vanbesien
body:
When a reference plot is loaded, it searches for the corresponding
non-reference plot and updates the link from the non-reference plot to
the reference plot. This was already implemented.
When a non-reference plot is loaded, it searches for the corresponding
reference plot, but it forgot to do the actual linking. (It was just
setting flags, but nothing else.) So this is what we implemented now.

This fixes the reference plots during live running in the online.
title: Fixed the missing linking between plot and refplot (8_0_X)
